title: Great Home on 2650 S Garfield Street, Denver, CO
posting_body: ['Perfect for the people needing more room!', '3 bedroom/2 bath PLUS a studio house unit.', 'Shaded with a covered patio (furnished) on a private on a half acre.', 'Fireplace and a fountain, and the river steps away.', 'This home a large 3 bedroom home with 2 baths, (Main Home) and an attached studio house unit ( private entrance) 1 bedroom, 1 full bath with separate kitchenette, living room and storage.', 'This single story, mid century home is definitely unique.', 'It has a large friendly kitchen with a center island and breakfast bar.', 'Equipped with a new gas stove, refrigerator (included), laundry room (washer and dryer included)', 'It is an "old school" home, which means it has a family room and living room and a covered outdoor patio.', 'And more.', 'The studio house unit has its own private entrance: A kitchenette, bedroom, a large bathroom, and living room.', 'Covered 2 car parking, finished front and backyards with old roses and trees.', 'Great for gardening and entertaining.', 'Not the newest home you will see but the best for great memories.', "You'll have easy access to 375 and i-10.Other details about the home Pet rent 100.00 a month upon landlord approval Locked single car garage on property, Freshly painted, new roof", 'If you are looking to stay for at least one year then consider it.', 'CALL:', 'show contact info']
